original_text: Then the king's countenance was changed, and his thoughts troubled him, so that the joints of his loins were loosed, and his knees smote one against another.
korean_text: 이에 왕의 즐기던 얼굴 빛이 변하고 그 생각이 번민하여 넓적다리 마디가 녹는 듯하고 그의 무릎이 서로 부딪친지라

sentences.original_text: Then the king's countenance was changed
so that the joints of his loins were loosed
and his knees smote one against another
